result.eng: Would you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ga: ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.orig: ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadh
result.html: ar mhiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a bhogadhWould you mind helping me to move this table?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁiste leat cuidiú liom an tábla seo a ḃogaḋWould you mind helping me to move this table?

result.ga: go raibh maith agat as cabhrú liom
result.orig: go raibh maith agat as cabhrú liom
result.html: go raibh maith agat as cabhrú liomThank you for helping me.
result.ponchtml: go raiḃ maiṫ agat as caḃrú liomThank you for helping me.

result.ga: is maith liom cabhrú le daoine
result.orig: is maith liom cabhrú le daoine
result.html: is maith liom cabhrú le daoineI like helping people.
result.ponchtml: is maiṫ liom caḃrú le daoineI like helping people.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ga: má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.orig: má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.html: má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ponchtml: má ḃíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beiḋ fáilte roṁatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.eng: Aren't you supposed to be helping us?
result.ga: nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linn
result.orig: nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linn
result.html: nach bhfuil tú in ainm is a bheith ag cuidiú linnAren't you supposed to be helping us?
result.ponchtml: naċ ḃfuil tú in ainm is a ḃeiṫ ag cuidiú linnAren't you supposed to be helping us?

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
